channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hobbs London Outlet
channel.desc: Inspired by London and designed in London, Hobbs has been providing modern cuts, feminine tailoring and heritage craftsmanship since their establishment in Hampstead in 1981.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Sale
channel.desc: Presenting a spectacular selection of gorgeous shoes, handbags and many more accessories from brands you'll adore, all at unbelievable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Nina Leonard Sale
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with the Nina Leonard Sale! Enjoy up to 50% off on stylish, versatile pieces designed for modern living. Don't miss out on these fabulous fashion finds.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Revamp your wardrobe with gorgeous styles from Ruth Langsford at unbeatable sale prices. Tune in to find everything you need to find your chic new look.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Osprey London
channel.desc: Fall in love with Osprey London's leather goods in this show, from beautiful bags to wow-worthy wallets. Perfect gifts for loved ones or yourself, you're sure to discover something you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Save on stylish, timeless fashion designs from Seasalt Cornwall in our big Sale and update your wardrobe today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 60% off Home2Garden
channel.desc: Up to 60% off Home2Garden.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: YouGarden
channel.desc: Discover beautiful plants and all the garden essentials you need, from You Garden.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Osprey London
channel.desc: Fall in love with Osprey London's leather goods in this show, from beautiful bags to wow-worthy wallets. Perfect gifts for loved ones or yourself, you're sure to discover something you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags on 5EZ
channel.desc: Luxury Handbags on 5EZ.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Sale
channel.desc: Presenting a spectacular selection of gorgeous shoes, handbags and many more accessories from brands you'll adore, all at unbelievable prices.
